Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any problems when using this skill, you can contact us with email : info@greenliteusa.com .

You can use Alexa to voice control smart lights, smart plugs etc smart devices in your house.
You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. 
You can group items by room to control multiple devices at once, for example: “Alexa, turn on the dining room.”
To get started, please connect Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Greenlite” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Greenlite” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “Greenlite Smart Home” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
"Alexa, turn on the living room light"
"Alexa, turn off the living room light"
"Alexa, set the living room light to 50%"
"Alexa, set the living room light to green"

Currently this skill supports products: smart switch, smart socket, smart bulb....
